extendedInfo.description: [Description]Brother iPrint&Label is a free application that enables you to easily print labels from your Android smartphone/tablet to a Brother label printer using a local wireless network. For a list of supported models, please visit your local Brother website.[Key Features]1. Easy to use menus.2. Quickly open and print pre-designed labels.3. Create custom labels with graphics or photos.4. Print address labels from contact lists.5. Print name badges with photos from your album.6. Automatic label formatting based on label size used.7. Automatically search for supported devices on a local wireless network.8. No computer or printer driver required.*HVGA (320x480 pixels) or larger screen is needed on your Android device.[Compatible machines]QL-710W, QL-720NW, QL-580N[Compatible OS]OS 2.2 or above

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Although this is excellent for quick label printing and works effortlessly with the printer this app needs a lot of work. The ability to create text boxes and to be able to add images/art to all labels (simple & templates) is sorely missing. Syncing saved labels to dropbox/box would also be useful as a backup.
reviews.author: Rich Green

reviews.title: No data type handler
reviews.comment: Your app allows a label to be an image stored on the device but there is no option to set as default when an image is selected. Unfortunately this oversight/easy fix will be the difference between me using the app or me returning my label printer.
reviews.author: Jody Marshall

reviews.title: Incompatible
reviews.comment: needs to work with more Brother labelers
reviews.author: Blurt Whirp

reviews.title: Malware
reviews.comment: Installed and Mcafee Mobile Security found Artemis!074151ed884a which is a malware.
reviews.author: Louie Ting

reviews.title: Not enough printer options
reviews.comment: Not compatible with my Wi-Fi Brother printer. Only gives you an option of two printers. BROTHER NEEDS to update for other Wi-Fi printers. Otherwise this app is useless. I\'m not going to buy another printer when mine works well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More features
reviews.comment: Please add ability to switch from portrait to landscape orientation. Also add ability to center text, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works perfect for my networked label printer. OF WHICH EXACTLY IT\'S DESIGNED FOR. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: not compatible with my Brother printer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, needs 1 fix
reviews.comment: Don\'t know how this bug hasn\'t been fixed yet, but the dk1209 1.1\" x 2.4\" label will only come up as 2.4 x 1.1 which causes it to only print in portrait orientation rendering it useless for me.  Please fix this or add a feature to adjust to portrait or landscape orientation like on the P-touch software.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for mobile label printer
reviews.comment: Great for Brothers mobile label printers! We use this add events to let people print their own name badges
reviews.author: Brad Durbin

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Not compatible with HTC DNA phone..\"compatible printer not found\"
reviews.author: nerio romero
